ticket.description:
The sort and filter should work as follows:
- if there are more then N results that match exactly the search results then all other results should be filtered out. N should be a setting in dbsettings. The results should be sorted alphabetically. - If there are less then N results that match exactly the search criteria. Then the nearby results should also be shown and the exact match results (if exist) should be shown first and then other results should be shown ordered by distance.
ticket.summary: Need to sort (and filter) results of business search on best match
For facebook need to handle different message types (link, picture, comment, ...)

ticket.description:
We need to add a sort order to the sources structures a number from 1 to N - it should follow the following precedence for now
1. Yelp 2. Googleplaces 3. CityGrid 4. Facebook 5. Twitter 6. Yahoo Local 7. Foursquare 8. Web
Where ever we show sources we should order them based on this precedence. This should be done through the backend APIs. On my listings page the listing should follow source order. /account/id/business/id/instances - needs to follow this order Recommended listings should show all alerts where ignored=False in sort order followed by all alerts that follow ignored=True in sort order. /account/id/location/id/alerts - needs to follow this order for missing listing alerts. On the competitors page the order of source types. /account/id/location/id/competitivematrix needs to be fixed.
ticket.summary: Add sorting order to sources and display sources in correct order through out the ui
Rescan on my listings is not working properly on backend

ticket.description: Support loading requests by parts, implementing the pending flag, this does not include handling partial loading on each view. The idea would be to implement a mechanism similar to the one implemented for the tagcloud, if the server returns the pending flag, the collection needs to retry the request and replace (or add) new results, to the corresponding collection.
ticket.summary: Implement pending flag loading on the base collection class

Resetting all the choice to default account/aid/preconditions_reset

ticket.description:
This ticket contains unresolved preconditions and dependencies issues that I am finding as I go through the SMB source specs.
1) don't know how to detect 'Not owner of listing' for twitter. 2) need to figure out how to delete tweet on twitter. 3) does change in rating alert really have a precondition? 4) new listing found alerts will need to be checked after they are implemented. 5) no report abuse post action in yelp. 6) we only have is_claimed and is_closed detection for yelp. 7) need to figure out how to handle multiple listings on citygrid. 8) should citygrid handle claim business actions? (it does have that ability) 9) need to implement 'not owner' detection for facebook. 10) need to implement 'report_abuse' action for facebook. 11) why does facebook listing_mismatch and listing_info_missing actions need custom forms?
ticket.summary: Unresolved preconditions/dependencies issues

ticket.description:
Remove configuration from settings.py to allow changes without changing the code.
MAX_SEARCH_RESULTS should come from dbsettings in util/dbsettings.py so we can make changes to it with out changing the code. You will need to add the info to setting table in mySQL to have the value show up in dbsettings.
Sources order be stored in mongo initialization script - so we can change the order in the DB without changing code in production.
ticket.summary: Change where the configuration values are stored

ticket.description:
Looking at the post filter, we have:
Source filter: you know the current value looking at the combo, you reset it selecting all sources. Flagged: you don't know if it's active, you reset it by clicking All. Porposed: mark active filter with bg color. Rating: you sometimes know the current value by the bg color on the stars, but can't distinguish between Rated, Unrated or "All". Proposed: move Unrated to the top, leaving something like Rated(n) | Urated(n) | All. Mark similar to flagged filter. Tagcloud: you know the current value looking for the word on top of the image or highlighted word in the post, you reset it by clicking clear.
So at least flagged and rating filters require some review.
ticket.summary: Small improvements to post filtering
